Table of Contents

NAME

SYNOPSIS

DESCRIPTION

The function displays a prompt to, and reads in a password from, If this file is not accessible, displays the prompt on the standard error output and reads from the standard input. The password may be up to _PASSWORD_LEN (currently 128) characters in length. Any additional characters and the terminating newline character are discarded. turns off character echoing while reading the password.

RETURN VALUES

returns a pointer to the null terminated password.

FILES

SEE ALSO

HISTORY

A function appeared in

BUGS

The function leaves its result in an internal static object and returns a pointer to that object. Subsequent calls to will modify the same object. The calling process should zero the password as soon as possible to avoid leaving the cleartext password visible in the process’s address space.
